your johnson!

and sqoosh it, lebowski.

last night in van nuys

didn't get chopped,

the retaining wall.

on the report. Sorry.

on the other side.

found on the road

You're lucky they left
the tape deck, though,

Aw, jesus!

Or maybe just used it
as a toilet and moved on.

Are you gonna find
these guys or, you know,

I mean, you got any
promising, uh, leads or...

I'll just check
with the boys
